directions.text: Cook pasta and cover with spaghetti sauce, set aside.
Cut the chicken in half lengthwise and pound each piece until it's about a ½" thick.
In a medium bowl whisk egg into milk.
In a big bowl mix bread crumbs, all spices, and grated Parmesan cheese.
Dip chicken into milk, then into spice bowl. Then dip it back into milk and spices once more.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet and brown chicken for 2½ mins each side.
Lay chicken on top of pasta in a dish, while laying a slice of mozzarella cheese on top of each piece.
